widgets_values:
Here are the nodes relevant to experimental noise injection in ComfyUI:

### 1. ComfyUI_Noise
- **Description:** This extension contains 6 nodes for ComfyUI that allows for more control and flexibility over the noise.
- **Category:** Noise Processing
- **Link:** [ComfyUI Noise](https://github.com/BlenderNeko/ComfyUI_Noise)

### 2. PPF_Noise_ComfyUI
- **Description:** Nodes: WAS_PFN_Latent. Perlin Power Fractal Noisey Latents.
- **Category:** Noise Processing
- **Link:** [PPF_Noise_ComfyUI](https://github.com/WASasquatch/PPF_Noise_ComfyUI)

### 3. Power Noise Suite for ComfyUI
- **Description:** Power Noise Suite contains nodes centered around latent noise input, and diffusion, as well as latent adjustments.
- **Category:** Noise Processing
- **Link:** [Power Noise Suite](https://github.com/WASasquatch/PowerNoiseSuite)

### 4. ComfyUI_NoiseLatentPerlinPinPin
- **Description:** Nodes: NoisyLatentPerlin. This allows to create latent spaces filled with perlin-based noise that can actually be used by the samplers.
- **Category:** Noise Processing
- **Link:** [NoiseLatentPerlinPinPin](https://github.com/Extraltodeus/noise_latent_perlinpinpin)

### 5. ComfyUI_SUNoise
- **Description:** Scaled Uniform Noise for Ancestral and Stochastic samplers.
- **Category:** Noise Processing
- **Link:** [ComfyUI SUNoise](https://github.com/bvhari/ComfyUI_SUNoise)

### 6. FizzNodes
- **Description:** Scheduled prompts, scheduled float/int values and wave function nodes for animations and utility. compatible with [framesync](https://www.framesync.xyz/) and [keyframe-string-generator](https://www.chigozie.co.uk/keyframe-string-generator/).
- **Category:** Randomization Nodes
- **Link:** [FizzNodes](https://github.com/FizzleDorf/ComfyUI_FizzNodes)

### 7. Noise variation and batch noise tools
- **Description:** Nodes to create small variations on noise, to shape noise, and to control noise in batches. Replaces the old 'variation-seed' nodes.
- **Category:** Noise Processing
- **Link:** [Noise variation and batch noise tools](https://github.com/chrisgoringe/cg-noisetools)

### 8. ComfyUI Dynamic Noise
- **Description:** Provides a simple way to add noise dynamically during generation by modifying latent tensors in a structured way.
- **Category:** Noise Processing
- **Link:** [ComfyUI Dynamic Noise](https://github.com/chrisgoringe/cg-everywhere)

These nodes can help you experiment with noise injection in your ComfyUI projects.
list me nodes for experimental noise injection.
